verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me אִם־ <WH518> though יַעֲמֹ֨ד <WH5975> stood מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> unto me Though Moses וּשְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> and Samuel לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> before אֵ֥ין <WH369> Me נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> me [yet] my mind אֶל־ <WH413> about הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> [could] not [be] toward this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this שַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> cast [them] out מֵֽעַל־ <WH5921> from פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> of my sight וְיֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <WH3318> and let them go forth

וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> shall be that כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when יֹאמְר֥וּ <WH559> And it shall come to pass if they say אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you אָ֣נָה <WH575> Where נֵצֵ֑א <WH3318> unto thee Whither shall we go forth וְאָמַרְתָּ֨ <WH559> ? then thou shalt tell אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> them Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> those לַמָּ֤וֶת <WH4194> Such as [are] for death לַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> to death וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and those לַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> and such as [are] for the sword לַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> to the sword וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> and those לָֽרָעָב֙ <WH7458> and such as [are] for the famine לָֽרָעָ֔ב <WH7458> to the famine וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> and those לַשְּׁבִ֖י <WH7628> and such as [are] for the captivity לַשֶּֽׁבִי׃ <WH7628> to the captivity

וּפָקַדְתִּ֨י <WH6485> And I will appoint עֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH5921> over אַרְבַּ֤ע <WH702> over them four מִשְׁפָּחוֹת֙ <WH4940> kinds נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> the sword לַֽהֲרֹ֔ג <WH2026> to slay וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּלָבִ֖ים <WH3611> and the dogs לִסְחֹ֑ב <WH5498> to tear וְאֶת־ <WH853> ע֧וֹף <WH5775> and the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <WH8064> of the heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֶּהֱמַ֥ת <WH929> and the beasts הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <WH398> to devour וּלְהַשְׁחִֽית׃ <WH7843> and destroy

וּנְתַתִּ֣ים <WH5414> And I will cause [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַֽעֲוָ֔ה <WH2113> be removed ק) לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> into all kingdoms הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth בִּ֠גְלַל <WH1558> because מְנַשֶּׁ֤ה <WH4519> of Manasseh בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְחִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH2396> of Hezekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah עַ֥ל <WH5921> for אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> for [that] which he did בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

כִּ֠י <WH3588> Indeed מִֽי־ <WH4310> who יַחְמֹ֤ל <WH2550> For who shall have pity עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> on יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem וּמִ֖י <WH4310> who יָנ֣וּד <WH5110> will mourn לָ֑ךְ וּמִ֣י <WH4310> who יָס֔וּר <WH5493> thee? or who shall go aside לִשְׁאֹ֥ל <WH7592> to ask לְשָׁלֹ֖ם <WH7965> favor לָֽךְ׃

אַ֣תְּ <WH859> who נָטַ֥שְׁתְּ <WH5203> Thou hast forsaken אֹתִ֛י <WH853> נְאֻם־ <WH5002> me saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אָח֣וֹר <WH268> backward תֵּלֵ֑כִי <WH1980> going וָאַ֨ט <WH5186> therefore will I stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֤י <WH3027> my hand עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> against וָֽאַשְׁחִיתֵ֔ךְ <WH7843> against thee and destroy נִלְאֵ֖יתִי <WH3811> thee I am weary הִנָּחֵֽם׃ <WH5162> with repenting

וָאֶזְרֵ֥ם <WH2219> And I will fan בְּמִזְרֶ֖ה <WH4214> them with a fan בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֣י <WH8179> in the gates הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land שִׁכַּ֤לְתִּי <WH7921> I will bereave אִבַּ֙דְתִּי֙ <WH6> [them] of children I will destroy אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> my people מִדַּרְכֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1870> not from their ways לוֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָֽׁבוּ׃ <WH7725> [since] they return

עָֽצְמוּ־ <WH6105> are increased לִ֤י אַלְמְנֹתָו֙ <WH490> Their widows מֵח֣וֹל <WH2344> to me above the sand יַמִּ֔ים <WH3220> of the seas הֵבֵ֨אתִי <WH935> I have brought לָהֶ֥ם <WH1992> them עַל־ <WH5921> against אֵ֛ם <WH517> upon them against the mother בָּח֖וּר <WH970> of the young men שֹׁדֵ֣ד <WH7703> a spoiler בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <WH6672> at noonday הִפַּ֤לְתִּי <WH5307> I have caused [him] to fall עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> against פִּתְאֹ֔ם <WH6597> upon it suddenly עִ֖יר <WH5892> upon the city וּבֶהָלֽוֹת׃ <WH928> and terrors

אֻמְלְלָ֞ה <WH535> languisheth יֹלֶ֣דֶת <WH3205> She that hath borne הַשִּׁבְעָ֗ה <WH7651> seven נָפְחָ֥ה <WH5301> she hath given up נַפְשָׁ֛הּ <WH5315> the ghost [בָּאָה כ] (בָּ֥א <WH935> abide ק) שִׁמְשָׁ֛הּ <WH8121> her sun בְּעֹ֥ד <WH5750> yet יוֹמָ֖ם <WH3119> day בּ֣וֹשָׁה <WH954> she hath been ashamed וְחָפֵ֑רָה <WH2659> and confounded וּשְׁאֵֽרִיתָ֗ם <WH7611> and the residue לַחֶ֧רֶב <WH2719> to the sword אֶתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> of them will I deliver לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <WH341> their enemies נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

אֽוֹי־ <WH188> Woe לִ֣י אִמִּ֔י <WH517> is me my mother כִּ֣י <WH3588> that יְלִדְתִּ֗נִי <WH3205> that thou hast borne אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> me a man רִ֛יב <WH7379> of strife וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> and a man מָד֖וֹן <WH4066> of contention לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> to the whole earth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor נָשִׁ֥יתִי <WH5383> I have neither lent on usury וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor נָֽשׁוּ־ <WH5383> nor men have lent to me on usury בִ֖י כֻּלֹּ֥ה <WH3605> to me everyone מְקַלְלַֽונִי׃ <WH7043> [yet] every one of them doth curse ס

אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD אִם־ <WH518> verily לֹ֥א <WH3808> not [שָׁרֹותִךָ כ] (שֵֽׁרִיתִ֖יךָ <WH8325> Sharar ק) לְט֑וֹב <WH2896> it shall be well אִם־ <WH518> lo ל֣וֹא ׀ <WH3808> not הִפְגַּ֣עְתִּֽי <WH6293> to entreat בְךָ֗ בְּעֵ֥ת־ <WH6256> thee [well] in the time רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> of evil וּבְעֵ֥ת <WH6256> and in the time צָרָ֖ה <WH6869> of affliction אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> I will cause the enemy
הֲיָרֹ֨עַ <WH7489> break בַּרְזֶ֧ל ׀ <WH1270> Shall iron בַּרְזֶ֛ל <WH1270> iron מִצָּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> the northern וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> brasen

חֵילְךָ֧ <WH2428> Thy substance וְאוֹצְרוֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH214> and thy treasures לָבַ֥ז <WH957> to the spoil אֶתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> will I give לֹ֣א <WH3808> without בִמְחִ֑יר <WH4242> without price וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> for all חַטֹּאותֶ֖יךָ <WH2403> and [that] for all thy sins וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all גְּבוּלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1366> even in all thy borders

וְהַֽעֲבַרְתִּי֙ <WH5674> And I will make [thee] to pass אֶת־ <WH854> for אֹ֣יְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> with thine enemies בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> into a land לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדָ֑עְתָּ <WH3045> [which] thou knowest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אֵ֛שׁ <WH784> not for a fire קָדְחָ֥ה <WH6919> is kindled בְאַפִּ֖י <WH639> in mine anger עֲלֵיכֶ֥ם <WH5921> and תּוּקָֽד׃ <WH3344> [which] shall burn ס

אַתָּ֧ה <WH859> who יָדַ֣עְתָּ <WH3045> thou knowest יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD זָכְרֵ֤נִי <WH2142> remember וּפָקְדֵ֙נִי֙ <WH6485> me and visit וְהִנָּ֤קֶם <WH5358> me and revenge לִי֙ מֵרֹ֣דְפַ֔י <WH7291> me of my persecutors אַל־ <WH408> not לְאֶ֥רֶךְ <WH750> of your patience אַפְּךָ֖ <WH639> anger תִּקָּחֵ֑נִי <WH3947> take me not away דַּ֕ע <WH3045> know שְׂאֵתִ֥י <WH5375> that for thy sake I have suffered עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> your sake חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <WH2781> rebuke

נִמְצְא֤וּ <WH4672> were found דְבָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1697> Thy words וָאֹ֣כְלֵ֔ם <WH398> and I did eat וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> became [דְבָרֶיךָ כ] (דְבָֽרְךָ֙ <WH1697> your words ק) לִ֔י לְשָׂשׂ֖וֹן <WH8342> was unto me the joy וּלְשִׂמְחַ֣ת <WH8057> and rejoicing לְבָבִ֑י <WH3824> of mine heart כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִקְרָ֤א <WH7121> for I am called שִׁמְךָ֙ <WH8034> by thy name עָלַ֔י <WH5921> and יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts ס

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יָשַׁ֥בְתִּי <WH3427> I sat בְסוֹד־ <WH5475> not in the assembly מְשַׂחֲקִ֖ים <WH7832> of the mockers וָֽאֶעְלֹ֑ז <WH5937> nor rejoiced מִפְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> because יָֽדְךָ֙ <WH3027> of thy hand בָּדָ֣ד <WH910> alone יָשַׁ֔בְתִּי <WH3427> I sat כִּֽי־ <WH3588> with זַ֖עַם <WH2195> me with indignation מִלֵּאתָֽנִי׃ <WH4390> for thou hast filled ס

לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> been כְאֵבִי֙ <WH3511> Why is my pain נֶ֔צַח <WH5331> perpetual וּמַכָּתִ֖י <WH4347> and my wound אֲנוּשָׁ֑ה֙ <WH605> incurable מֵֽאֲנָה֙ <WH3985> [which] refuseth הֵֽרָפֵ֔א <WH7495> to be healed הָי֨וֹ <WH1961> been תִֽהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> been לִי֙ כְּמ֣וֹ <WH3644> like אַכְזָ֔ב <WH391> ? wilt thou be altogether unto me as a liar מַ֖יִם <WH4325> [and as] waters לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נֶאֱמָֽנוּ׃ <WH539> [that] fail ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אִם־ <WH518> If תָּשׁ֤וּב <WH7725> If thou return וַאֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֙ <WH7725> then will I bring thee again לְפָנַ֣י <WH6440> before תַּֽעֲמֹ֔ד <WH5975> [and] thou shalt stand וְאִם־ <WH518> and if תּוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> me and if thou take forth יָקָ֛ר <WH3368> the precious מִזּוֹלֵ֖ל <WH2151> from the vile כְּפִ֣י <WH6310> thou shalt be as my mouth תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> will become יָשֻׁ֤בוּ <WH7725> let them return הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> their part אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> unto thee but return אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> then

וּנְתַתִּ֜יךָ <WH5414> And I will make לָעָ֣ם <WH5971> thee unto this people הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> to this לְחוֹמַ֤ת <WH2346> wall נְחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH5178> brasen בְּצוּרָ֔ה <WH1219> a fenced וְנִלְחֲמ֥וּ <WH3898> and they shall fight אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> against וְלֹא־ <WH3808> They will not י֣וּכְלוּ <WH3201> against thee but they shall not prevail לָ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אִתְּךָ֥ <WH854> for אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I am לְהוֹשִֽׁיעֲךָ֥ <WH3467> against thee for I [am] with thee to save וּלְהַצִּילֶ֖ךָ <WH5337> thee and to deliver נְאֻם־ <WH5002> thee saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְהִצַּלְתִּ֖יךָ <WH5337> And I will deliver מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> thee out of the hand רָעִ֑ים <WH7451> of the wicked וּפְדִתִ֖יךָ <WH6299> and I will redeem מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> thee out of the hand עָרִצִֽים׃ <WH6184> of the terrible פ
